(If there is any issue with what's wrote above (ex: company name misspelled; something that's in your property or your organisation property, appear in app or in the source code but not above; name or logo that doesn't appear like you want (like (tm) or © missing); bad attributions of some resources; or any other kind of legal issue) please contact me thought my email address given on Github or on the Play store page of the app, before engage procedures, so I can fix this issue, I'm a beginner with publishing apps or legal issues in general so it's certainly not perfect… sorry)
